name: Data Analyst Intern
description:
NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ: NXPI) enables secure connections and infrastructure for a smarter world, advancing solutions that make lives easier, better, and safer. As the world leader in secure connectivity solutions for embedded applications, NXP is driving innovation in the automotive, industrial & IoT, mobile, and communication infrastructure markets. Built on more than 60 years of combined experience and expertise, the company has over 29,000 employees in more than 30 countries and posted revenue of $8.88 billion in 2019.

Main Job Objective: Apply data analytics and machine learning to optimization of compute and electronic design automation (EDA) cost and throughput, forecast of the needs of chip design projects in EDA licenses and compute resources

Main responsibilities:

  • Learn and understand NXP needs in data analytics and machine learning
  • Use Data Science skills to analyze and optimize NXP’s IC design flow, EDA license and compute usage
  • Assist data analysts in achieving goals of the global Software and Analytics project

Requirements:

  • A student studying for a Master's degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering
  • Programming skills such as Python
  • Strong basis of statistics or data analysis concepts
  • Familiarity with data analytics topics and related software tools (e.g., Apache Spark, Apache Hadoop, Jupyter Notebook, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Pytorch)
  • Experience working in the Linux environment, and using Linux utilities (e.g., make, awk, bash scripting) is preferred
  • An analytical thinker with problem-solving skills and attention to detail
  • Possesses communication, interpersonal, and teaching skills
  • Enjoys working in a fast-paced, multi-project, international team using state of the art tools and technology
  • Written and verbal communication skills in English enough to communicate with colleagues and EDA tool users throughout the global company

We offer:

  • Internship at the Russian site of NXP in Zelenograd, Moscow
  • Development opportunities in the industry leading company
  • Technical mentoring program
  • Experience in a global company that develops semiconductor products of the utmost complexity, consisting of electrical components several nanometers in size
  • Acquisition of knowledge and experience in working with state-of-the-art tools and technologies
  • Participation in a global project to optimize the company's resources as a data analyst along with specialists in other domains (software developers, methodologists, IT specialists, users of chip design tools)
  • Possibility to get a permanent job at NXP Semiconductors after completing an internship
